-- The equation a=b belongs to the congruence generated by the three
-- equations: b=d, f(b)=d, and f(d)=a. 

-- Truth => exists a . E(a) & A(a)
Truth => exists b . E(b) & B(b)
Truth => exists d . E(d) & D(d)
B(x) & D(y) => x = y  --  b  = d


--B(x) & D(y) => f(x) = y  -- f(b) = d
--A(u) & D(v) => f(v) = u  -- f(d) = a

-- so should get a=b from above
